plugins

Class PublisherPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractPlugin
      • plugins.PublisherPlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.PluginI, ManagementImplementationI, PublicationsImplementationI, java.io.Serializable

    public class PublisherPlugin
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractPlugin
implements PublicationsImplementationI, ManagementImplementationI
    This class PublisherPlugin represent the Publisher plug-in that implement all the method of PublicationsImplementationI and ManagementImplementationI. Beside, all the ports are publish and connected too.
    Author:
    GROUP LAMA
    See Also:
